item.title: The ‘New’ Solution for the N.Y.C. Housing Crisis: Single-Room Apartments
item.description: There is a push to revive single-room occupancy housing, where kitchens and bathrooms are shared among apartments as small as 100 square feet each.

item.title: Joan Branson, Richard Branson’s Wife of 35 Years, Dies at 80
item.description: Mr. Branson, the Virgin Atlantic founder, announced her death in an Instagram post.
